# Admin console version visibility (2025-12-06 06:00Z)

---

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
I see the issue. The sidebar has:
- A header section with "Admin Console" 
- A nav section with `flex-1` which makes it take all available space
- A footer with the version at the bottom (`p-4 border-t border-gray-800`)

The version is at the very bottom of the sidebar, which means if the viewport is small or content is tall, you'd have to scroll. 

The user wants the version visible without scrolling. A good solution would be to move it to the header area (next to or below "Admin Console") so it's always visible at the top.

Let me update the component to show the version in the header.</details></think>

---

The version is currently at the bottom of the sidebar. I'll move it to the header so it's always visible.
